title: No more whiskey for Callaghan! (1955, Thriller) by Willy Rozier | with Tony Wright

sources.title: No more whiskey for Callaghan! (1955, Thriller) by Willy Rozier | with Tony Wright
sources.description:
British detective Slim Callaghan is hired to investigate a document theft, leading him to the Côte d'Azur. There, he finds himself entangled in a network of aristocratic spies and criminals. When Doria Varette, his key contact, is suddenly murdered, Callaghan realizes he’s up against powerful enemies in a dangerous pursuit for the truth.

Original title: Plus de whisky pour Callaghan! (1955)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/ue-2Ov360bI


Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Peter Cheyney, Willy Rozier, Jacques Vilfrid
Actors: Tony Wright, Magali Vendeuil, Robert Berri 
Genres: French Cinema, Action, Comedy, Crime, Thriller


NEXT film in the Callaghan series:  Et par ici la sortie / And Through Here the Exit (1957) https://youtu.be/FRTBMWSI70w


@CultCinemaClassics
